profile:
At City Concrete Construction Inc. we are construction contractors for large industrial and residential projects.  

Our in-house construction division is able to service all your professional concrete finishing, foundation walls, basement underpinning, countertops, outside kitchens, hard landscaping, interlocking stonework, residential waterproofing, masonry tuck-pointing and restoration and disposal bins. City Concrete’s finishing employees have had a combined total of over 75 years of experience, within the concrete and construction industry.  

We are proud members of the Toronto and Mississauga Construction Association. 

We are also Licensed contractors by the City of Toronto

profile: Royal Stone is a recognized installer of premier interlocking paving stones, retaining walls, steps, curbs, and natural stone products. Whether you're designing a complete streetscape or a residential walkway, patio and driveway, Royal Stone can provide you with a range of applications. Our qualified staff will take your project from the design stage to completion in an organized and professional manner. Let your surroundings express who you are. Royal Stone's experienced landscape designers will guide you in selecting features that come together to create balance and harmony. Our use of hand drawn and computer-generated renderings effectively bridge the gap between concept and reality, assuring our clients that their new surroundsing will be all that they envisioned - and more. DRIVEWAYS / WALKWAYS Driveways and walkways provide curb appearl to homes. They are a point of artistic expression allowing customers to express their personal style. OUTDOOR LIVING Outdoor living spaces provide an impressive focal point where you can relax, dine and entertain with familiy and friends. Outdoor kitchens, fireplaces and firepits are just some of the possibilities. POOLS Pools provide an impressive focal point where you can relax and entertain with family and friends. Spas are great alternative for spaces wehre a pool is not feasible. WE SPECIALIZE IN Driveways, Walkways, Interlocking Stone, Flagstone, Pools, Spas, Hot Tubs, Water Features, Inifinity Edge, Landscaping, Patios, Cabanas, Gazebos, Outdoor Kitchens & Fireplaces

profile:
Concrete One Ltd. is an industry-leading, family-owned and operated company that has been in service for more than 30 years and three generations. In this time, we have provided customers with quality workmanship at an affordable price. We have developed and proven expertise and skill in concrete, paving, finishing, and landscaping.

***

Our greatest pride is our extreme attention to detail and determination for customers to be happy with the final result. This combination of hard work and providing the best service has been the key to keeping us at the top of our industry for more than three decades.

***

We prize the long-lasting relationships we have formed with our clients. Among them are the people at Eagle Steel Inc., Downsview Long-Term Care Centre, Perfect Poultry Inc., Red Horse Construction Corp., and the countless homeowners who have let us help them beautify their property. The trust and confidence they give us is more than enough to keep us going. At Concrete One Ltd., we kindly thank our clients, both past and present, along with anyone considering our services for their next project.

We look forward to working with you.
name: Concrete One Ltd.

profile:
Welcome to AMPAC PavingVersatile experience in residential landscaping services and commercial paving. AMPAC Paving and Concrete is a quality driven, consumer oriented business with a reputation for excellence. We have been delivering superior service in the GTA for over a quarter-century. 

***

Residential Landscaping Service — Curb Appeal Specialists
Curb-Appeal is a real estate term that rates your home exterior appearance. Let AMPAC help you maximize your Curb Appeal with:
Classic Asphalt Paving
Decorative Interlocking Brick
Custom Concrete Curbs, Walk-paths, Garage Flooring
Durable and Pleasing Retainer Walls
Commercial Paving — Professional Contractors
Whether you're renovating existing or building new, AMPAC has the people the experience and the equipment to get the job done on time and on budget:
Roadway and Parking Lot Paving
Concrete curbs and Walkways
Asphalt and Paving Repairs and Resurfacing
Interlock Sidewalks

***

Contact us today to schedule your appointment.

profile:
KP Construction Inc. was established in 1996. Since then we are serving our service in Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto, Orangeville, Caledon, Oakville, Burlington, Hamilton, Milton and York Region.

KP Construction Inc. manufactures their own proprietary stamping tools that are considered to be the highest level of professional quality.

KP Construction Inc. carries out the entire installation of each individual project from the initial design stage to completion of the project, using its own vehicles, tools and machines, without the use of any sub-contractors.

KP Construction Inc. has best position in the industry. Also KP Construction Inc. maintained their reputation with best position in the industrial market with no obligation since it’s established. Our professionals are truly architectural concrete craftsman that consider their work a form of art, and not just another job.

At the end every year since KP Construction Inc. establish we maintain our reputation with best ranking in gta and near area.

profile:
Royal Crown Construction offers a wide range of concrete services for commercial and residential projects. We are fully licensed, insured and bonded concrete contractors, proudly serving Brampton, Mississauga, Markham, Ajax, Whitby, Oshawa and Richmond Hill areas. Our team of industry professionals has extensive experience and top of the line equipment to accommodate any kind of project.

For the past many years, we have been meeting our client’s expectations through our top-notch stamped concrete, architectural concrete and landscape jobs.
